sentences: Charles Richard Jeremy Fox (1921 â€“ 9 May 1991 in Weymouth) was an English writer and broadcaster who specialised in jazz.
In addition he occasionally contributed to The Guardian, The Sunday Times and The Gramophone.
From the early 1960s onwards, he hosted the British radio programme Jazz Today.
Fox's book on Fats Waller was published in 1960.
in 1972 he authored a guide to the history of Jazz titled The Jazz Scene.
Later in 1984, he co-wrote a guide to jazz recordings titled The Essential Jazz Recordings, i: Ragtime to Swing with Max Harrison and Eric Thacker.
